title: Welcome Home
description: Frankie Bounds returns home from University for the summer, reluctantly giving up the city life she's grown accustomed to. Small-town New Zealand moves so much slower - and her world has changed so completely that it seems as though she's only wasting time.There's no rest for the wicked, however - and when she hears of missing persons and mysterious sounds, it seems as though the trials of the city have followed her home.An episodic, 12-installment series about a small coastal New Zealand town, its scars, and the supernatural forces that gather around its protector - Frankie Bounds.Each individual episode is free (or at base cost if purchased on Amazon) via https://www.jondauthor.work
author: Jon D. Arthur
